articles.author: Ryan Gaydos
articles.title: Odell Beckham Jr. makes highlight-reel catch in Cleveland Browns loss
articles.description: The Cleveland Browns' Odell Beckham Jr. made a catch bound for highlight reels Sunday against the Cincinnati Bengals.
articles.content:
The Cleveland Browns' Odell Beckham Jr. made a catch bound for highlight reels Sunday against the Cincinnati Bengals.
With 7:16 left in the fourth quarter, Beckham made a leaping grab and somehow got two feet down in the end zone on a 20-yard pass from Baker… [+1305 chars]
